biotools.summary:
The SHARK-capture CLI is a tool that identifies functional motifs in intrinsically disordered protein regions.
Increasing understanding of the sequence-function relationships in intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs) has highlighted the importance of sequence motifs in promoting its functions. Here we present SHARK-capture, an alignment-free, word-based motif detection tool designed specifically for IDRs and difficult-to-align regions.
